--------------------
Text: In the United Kingdom, the Accession Council is a ceremonial body which assembles in St James's Palace upon the death of a monarch (Demise of the Crown), to formally proclaim the accession of his or her successor to the throne.
Triplets:<In United Kingdom
2:
--------------------
Text: Accession Council:  The proclamation confirms by name the identity of the heir who has succeeded.
Triplets:<Accession Council
